content: We expect to start seeing the benefit of lower raw material prices in 3Q '23; three, we expect production levels to normalize in the second half, positively impacting utilization and setting the stage for plant productivity; fourth, we anticipate sales volumes will recover significantly from the 1Q '23, seasonally low and channel destocking impacted profile; five, we expect the whole price in our core markets; and lastly, six, with channel inventory reductions complete, we will start reducing inventory on our balance sheet and expect to finish the fiscal year with approximately $40 million lower inventory year-over-year.
